Sentencas: Sm2O3-doped CeO2 layers were synthesized on the inner surfaces of tube shaped quartz glass substrates using the MOCVD method.
Titulo: Deposition of Sm2O3-doped CeO2 layers using the MOCVD method

Sentencas: Ce(tmhd)(4) and Sm(tmhd)(3) were used as precursors.
Titulo: Deposition of Sm2O3-doped CeO2 layers using the MOCVD method

Sentencas: Argon and air were the carrier gases.
Titulo: Deposition of Sm2O3-doped CeO2 layers using the MOCVD method

Sentencas: Air was also a source of oxygen, necessary for the elimination of carbon (a solid by-product of the reactant pyrolysis).
Titulo: Deposition of Sm2O3-doped CeO2 layers using the MOCVD method

Sentencas: The molar content of Sm(tmhd)(3) in the reactant mixture was: 0.1; 0.2; 0.3.
Titulo: Deposition of Sm2O3-doped CeO2 layers using the MOCVD method

Sentencas: The temperature of the synthesis was maintained at 600-800 degrees C. Such a low synthesis temperature made possible the deposition of amorphous and nanocrystalline layers.
Titulo: Deposition of Sm2O3-doped CeO2 layers using the MOCVD method

Sentencas: The higher the synthesis temperature, the greater the content of the crystalline phase and the larger the crystallites.
Titulo: Deposition of Sm2O3-doped CeO2 layers using the MOCVD method

Sentencas: The obtained layers were analysed by the scanning electron microscopy combined with the EDS and X-ray analyses.
Titulo: Deposition of Sm2O3-doped CeO2 layers using the MOCVD method

Sentencas: This work is a part of research on amorphous and nanocrystalline composite electrolyte CeO2+Sm2O3/ZrO2+Y2O3 for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Deposition of Sm2O3-doped CeO2 layers using the MOCVD method
Deposition of Sm2O3-doped CeO2 layers using the MOCVD method
